SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.administrator.ManageStaff

Class UpdateStaffView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.administrator.ManageStaff.UpdateStaffView
public class UpdateStaffView extends View
The UpdateStaffView class handles the user interface for updating hospital staff information. It prompts the administrator to select a staff role, enter a user ID, update the staff details, and display appropriate success or error messages for staff updates.

  • Constructor Details

      public UpdateStaffView()

  • Method Details

    • displayHeader

      public void displayHeader()
      Displays the header for the Edit Staff view. It provides a bordered text representation with the title "Edit Staff".
      Specified by:
      displayHeader in class View

    • getRoleChoice

      public int getRoleChoice()
      Prompts the user to choose a role for the staff to be updated. The available choices are Doctor, Pharmacist, Receptionist, or Cancel.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer (1 for Doctor, 2 for Pharmacist, 3 for Receptionist, 4 for Cancel).

    • getID

      public String getID()
      Prompts the user to enter the ID of the staff member to be updated.
      Returns:
      the user ID entered by the administrator as a String.

    • staffDoesNotExist

      public void staffDoesNotExist()
      Displays an error message indicating that the staff member does not exist.

    • getDetails

      public List<String> getDetails()
      Prompts the user to enter the updated details of the staff member, including the name and gender. It loops until valid data is entered.
      Returns:
      a list of updated staff details (name and gender) as Strings.

    • getAge

      public int getAge()
      Prompts the user to enter the updated age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      the updated age as an integer.

    • printDetails

      public int printDetails(List<String> details, int age)
      Displays the updated details of the staff member and prompts the user to confirm or cancel the changes.
      Parameters:
      details - the updated details of the staff member.
      age - the updated age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      the user's choice (1 to confirm, 2 to cancel).

    • updateDoctorSuccessful

      public void updateDoctorSuccessful()
      Displays a success message indicating that the doctor update was successful.

    • updatePharmacistSuccessful

      public void updatePharmacistSuccessful()
      Displays a success message indicating that the pharmacist update was successful.

    • updateReceptionistSuccessful

      public void updateReceptionistSuccessful()
      Displays a success message indicating that the receptionist update was successful.
